rule.ruleDesc: Notification is triggered when the status of the ticket is changed to "Suspended"
rule.condition: open in $L.file="Suspended" and not (same(open in $L.file, open in $L.file.save))
rule.conditionDesc: ( open in CurrentRecord = "Suspended" AND open in CurrentRecord != open in SavedRecord)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">open</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Suspended</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">open</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">open</FieldName></Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: [Notification is triggered when the status of the ticket is changed to "Suspended" (when ( open in CurrentRecord = "Suspended" AND open in CurrentRecord != open in SavedRecord))]

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: sd.suspended to Assignment Group
rule.condition: same(assignee.name in $L.file, NULL) and not (same(assignment in $L.file, NULL))
rule.conditionDesc: ( assignee.name in CurrentRecord = NULL AND assignment in CurrentRecord != NULL)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignee">assignee.name</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignment Group">assignment</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: - Send HTML Email: sd.suspended to Assignment Group (when ( assignee.name in CurrentRecord = NULL AND assignment in CurrentRecord != NULL))

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: sd.suspended to Service Recipient
rule.fullDesc: - Send HTML Email: sd.suspended to Service Recipient
- Send HTML Email:sd.suspended to Assignee (when ( assignee.name in CurrentRecord != NULL))

rule.ruleDesc: Notification is triggered when the status of the ticket is changed from "Suspended" to other status
rule.condition: open in $L.file.save="Suspended" and not (same(open in $L.file.save, open in $L.file))
rule.conditionDesc: ( open in SavedRecord = "Suspended" AND open in SavedRecord != open in CurrentRecord)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">open</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">Suspended</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">open</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">open</FieldName></Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: [Notification is triggered when the status of the ticket is changed from "Suspended" to other status (when ( open in SavedRecord = "Suspended" AND open in SavedRecord != open in CurrentRecord))]

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: sd.unSuspended to Assignment Group
rule.condition: same(assignee.name in $L.file, NULL) and not (same(assignment in $L.file, NULL))
rule.conditionDesc: ( assignee.name in CurrentRecord = NULL AND assignment in CurrentRecord != NULL)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignee">assignee.name</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignment Group">assignment</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: - Send HTML Email: sd.unSuspended to Assignment Group (when ( assignee.name in CurrentRecord = NULL AND assignment in CurrentRecord != NULL))

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: sd.unSuspended to Service Recipient
rule.fullDesc: - Send HTML Email: sd.unSuspended to Service Recipient

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: sd.unSuspended to Assignee
rule.fullDesc: - Send HTML Email: sd.unSuspended to Assignee (when ( assignee.name in CurrentRecord != NULL))
